short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OSINT tool for images. Scans page for images with EXIF metadata, while browsing. Also has context menu options for images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open source OSINT tool for images. Scans page for images with EXIF metadata, while browsing, and shows all images found with EXIF data on popup window. Also provides context menu options for images such as reverse image search in different search engines, and metadata viewer.
